d8b237d3-4eb7-4c43-a69a-35b655795288.description: The foundational Zurich Customer Mastery Program focuses on how to live Customer Centricity at Zurich and how everybody plays a role, immersing the learner into the Zurich Purpose and Zurich Customer Experience (CX) vision whilst embracing a customer first mindset to empower and activate all employees. The learner will have a foundational ability to drive customer-centricity in their day-to-day job and will be equipped with the relevant Customer strategies and tools to start tomorrow.
d8b237d3-4eb7-4c43-a69a-35b655795288.name: Zurich Customer Mastery Program

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Zurich Customer Mastery Program online course.

38092721-87c3-4f5f-bf01-ae8c21beaf81.description: The Digital Mastery Program Foundational Level focuses on digital transformation for the financial services industry and what it means for Zurich. The course shows why digital transformation is important to the company and how it may impact the day-to-day job of the employees. The learner will discover some of the most in demand technologies, their basics and definitions, market knowledge or applications and the way Zurich uses these technologies.
38092721-87c3-4f5f-bf01-ae8c21beaf81.name: Digital Mastery Program Foundational Level

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the Digital Mastery Program Foundational Level course.

c1395344-ccd2-4043-89bc-ed8e0446aac2.description: Zurich’s leaders have learned to be catalysts for the cultural change to a customer-centric organization. Leaders developed the skills to put Zurich's strategy into action using techniques to: (i) drive transformation and innovation with urgency; (ii) better manage their energy and wellbeing; (iii) become great storytellers. They understand how leadership energy, tone, and resilience can drive sustainable results and the importance of leadership in a purpose and value-driven organization
c1395344-ccd2-4043-89bc-ed8e0446aac2.name: Complete Leadership at Zurich

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Complete Leadership Summit

dccde77e-b5c0-481b-ac73-6ea8e677a702.description: The Zurich CX Mastery Program focuses on establishing a CX baseline and capabilities at Zurich and to enable participants to design and implement unique customer experiences through the use of Zurich CX tools and design methods. This badge also confirms that participants have successfully completed immersive and experimental workshops where they have worked with cross-functional teams on small-scale CX improvement projects and adopted design based new ways of working.
dccde77e-b5c0-481b-ac73-6ea8e677a702.name: Zurich CX Mastery Program

badge_template_activities.title: Partake in the immersive and experimental workshops.

9cbf27ea-18dc-4587-8ae5-c65363299b0b.description: During the program, the Make the Difference participants collaborated in global, diverse teams and in agile ways to become ambassadors for culture change and innovation. They developed skills and techniques such as: agile working in cross-functional teams to enhance collaboration, design thinking and user experience techniques to develop customer and user focused solutions, change delivery skills, storytelling and presentation skills to senior executives.
9cbf27ea-18dc-4587-8ae5-c65363299b0b.name: Make the Difference

badge_template_activities.title: Training Project delivery

skills.name: Ability To Iterate Listen And Engage The Users In Order To Reach The Right Solution
Experienced Need For Collaboration To Truly Understand A Problem And Envolve The Solution

30a91811-f09a-4e88-baaf-dd5a023dac40.description: This program provides Zurich’s senior leaders with a platform to sharpen skills & gain insights & knowledge to thrive in the new working environment. Digital Leadership focuses on leaders enabling the workforce to experiment & learn with agility & pace in the digital space, heightening self-awareness on new technologies & business models reshaping the insurance industry.
30a91811-f09a-4e88-baaf-dd5a023dac40.name: Brighter Future Together - Digital Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Pre-work completion, course attendance, module completion, post-work completion

skills.name: Managing Execution & Innovation (as An Individual & As A Leader)

4ff7636a-e344-4433-ad59-1c2d8e969d26.description: Fit For Future Leadership is a development program aimed at senior leaders at Zurich. Participants have a clear understanding of the leadership skills to be successful in the digital age and the main "Future of Work" drivers that fuel the Digital Transformation; Customer Excellence, Technology & Data and Co-Operation. They participated in 5 Key-Events along the outlined topics and in best practice sharing sessions. These leaders successfully partnered in Peer Coachings & Sparring Partnerings
4ff7636a-e344-4433-ad59-1c2d8e969d26.name: Fit for Future Leadership: Leading in the Digital Age

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the Fit For Future Leadership Program which includes Assessment, Workshops, Peer Coaching Sessions and Sparring Partnering

61540bac-f0bd-45a6-8647-f18e548792bb.description: By completing the Leadership Breakthrough program participants now understand the fundamentals of good management. They will have been exposed to core management skills and attributes, including coaching, giving and receiving feedback, leadership styles, leading through change, leading inclusively, performance management, talent management, and leading with a growth mindset.
61540bac-f0bd-45a6-8647-f18e548792bb.name: Zurich Leadership Breakthrough

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full program of Leadership Breakthrough, in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work and the eight virtual webinars.

cddb0b16-5ac2-4aea-b1bb-e35919fa409e.description: This badge aims to recognize the members of “Zurich Let's Grow Together” community of practice for their great effort and commitment in enhancing the learning culture at Zurich and delivering on our employee promise. Over the past 2 years, the community members have shared best practices, created new learning products, worked to align local and global approaches, and ultimately built a strong learning community.
cddb0b16-5ac2-4aea-b1bb-e35919fa409e.name: Let's Grow Together Community - Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Active participation in "Zurich Let's Grow Together - Community of Practice"

9a4919ef-fd15-4837-8b8e-5e7c26b19d6e.description: The Brighter Future Together Program supports Zurich’s top leaders to sharpen their skills & gain insights & knowledge to thrive in the new working environment. It focuses on digital leadership, customer leadership, people leadership & enterprise leadership. Participants build skills to create a safe & positive environment for innovation, foster a customer-led culture, drive performance, prioritize & balance expectations of multiple stakeholders & lead with empathy & purpose.
9a4919ef-fd15-4837-8b8e-5e7c26b19d6e.name: EMEA Brighter Future Together - Customer Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Pre-work completion, course attendance, module completion, post-work completion.

f21ad7b5-b6b9-422d-a894-0a941b6ef145.description: MENTIC is an open mentoring programme that boosts knowledge sharing between colleagues through a collaborative environment. Participating in this programme gives you the opportunity to expand generational and cultural perspectives, strengthens technical, soft and leadership skills, while allowing you to explore new ideas and meet new people.
f21ad7b5-b6b9-422d-a894-0a941b6ef145.name: Zurich Mentic

badge_template_activities.title: Mentoring programme

0c841b12-d6bd-4f10-9637-fb9c1a8f3568.description: This training is aimed at customer advisors who want to deepen, systematise and professionalise their sales skills and serve their customers more professionally. Earners of this badge are supported in their attitude, behaviour & impact towards customers in a benefit-oriented sales conversation. They have a basic understanding of advanced sales methods, human behaviour & recognise different personality types. This supports them in successful sales communication and building sincere relationships.
0c841b12-d6bd-4f10-9637-fb9c1a8f3568.name: Gustav Käser Sales Training

badge_template_activities.title: This certification requires active participation in the Gustav Käser Sales Training Program, which includes assessment, presence training, and coaching sessions.

skills.name: Access and handling of different Personality Types

9361e3f0-25cd-4dce-9074-0c92452619fb.description: Talent in Motion; our key development program. Talent in Motion has the goal to develop our people; our talent, with learning by doing opportunities, while covering skill gaps by hiring talent in the market. TiM has a new site where ALL open roles can be find for people to apply (temporary, permanent, and half time assignments).
9361e3f0-25cd-4dce-9074-0c92452619fb.name: Talent in Motion

badge_template_activities.title: Talent in Motion is our key development program.

ad19c142-2457-4e32-a6ca-25ebc391a167.description: Un riconoscimento per aver contribuito alle attività della Claims School e, in particolare, per aver gestito il ruolo di docente con passione e capacità. Il tuo impegno ha consentito di condividere con i colleghi interni ed esterni nuove linee guida, procedure, norme e operatività utili per svolgere efficacemente il lavoro quotidiano.
ad19c142-2457-4e32-a6ca-25ebc391a167.name: Trainer Claims School Zurich Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Disponibilità a vestire i panni del docente, mettendoti in gioco, per favorire l'apprendimento sia dei colleghi interni sia della Rete Distributiva.

7aef7074-4067-4672-ba4f-aeacc9b8dc78.description: At Zurich Hong Kong, we are constantly driving positive impact in our community. This recognition is to appreciate our volunteers' dedication and devotion to our community. We thank all Super Volunteers for their contribution in making a difference and creating a sustainable future #together. The badge will be presented to the awardees of Zurich Volunteer Recognition Program 2022 in Hong Kong.
7aef7074-4067-4672-ba4f-aeacc9b8dc78.name: Super Volunteer 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Volunteer colleagues who have joined any of our internal volunteer activities, or participated in external NGO's community work are eligible to receive the badge after our review on total volunteer hours.

634ba868-b551-4412-9aeb-4ac14cef2050.description: Learn Engage Apply Perform (LEAP) is a one year soft skill program for people who want to take their career to a next level, by mastering business relevant soft skills. Through a three-pillar structure, participants learn the theory and additionally have the chance to apply the learned in real business cases as well as have an exchange with peers and subject matter experts. The program facilitates access to senior members of the organisation as well as building a strong business network.
634ba868-b551-4412-9aeb-4ac14cef2050.name: LEAP with WIN: Soft Skills development program 2021

badge_template_activities.title: Participants learn the theory and additionally have the chance to apply the learned in real business cases as well as have an exchange with peers and subject matter experts.

2e16a6df-56f7-4a06-9c7f-acde38d72797.description: Agile Enthusiast - Scrum Master is able to guide others to understand Scrum values, principles and practices by effectively applying the Scrum framework, facilitating Scrum events and acting as a servant-leader.
2e16a6df-56f7-4a06-9c7f-acde38d72797.name: Agile Enthusiast - Scrum Master

badge_template_activities.title: Agile Enthusiast - Scrum Master certification requires: 1) Completion of the Agile Enthusiast - Scrum Master training 2) Passing the assessment test with score of 80% or above 3) Active participation in the Professional Live Session workshop

69a91532-a612-4f6f-a209-cb7a6df3fe53.description: This program provides Zurich’s senior leaders with a platform to sharpen skills & gain insights & knowledge to thrive in the new working environment. Participants take part in peer coaching sessions in small groups.
69a91532-a612-4f6f-a209-cb7a6df3fe53.name: Brighter Future Together - Digital Leadership Module

a4290891-a201-489d-b4d3-9089760576dc.description: Certified ITIL 4 specialists understand how an integrated IT service management framework, based on ITIL 4 best practice guidelines, can be adopted and adapted within their own organizations. At the end of the course, the learner will understand the key concepts and the four dimensions of ITIL service management, the purpose and components of the ITIL service value system as well as the activities of the service value chain, and how they connect and key concepts of continual improvement.
a4290891-a201-489d-b4d3-9089760576dc.name: ITIL® 4 Foundation

badge_template_activities.title: ITIL® 4 Foundation certification requirements: 1) Completion of the ITIL® 4 Foundation training session 2) Take the ITIL® 4 Foundation Certification exam 3) Pass the exam with the 65% or higher

405c57bb-6f9a-4b4f-ba6a-def82e5a9943.description: Certified Lean Yellow Belts understand what Lean is and its importance to the business. They are able to articulate problem statements, recognize process wastes, determine root causes, as well as implement and monitor solutions. Through the certification project Lean Yellow Belts demonstrate their ability to apply Lean principles by delivering small improvement initiatives within their own area of work to maximize customer value and minimize waste.
405c57bb-6f9a-4b4f-ba6a-def82e5a9943.name: Lean Yellow Belt

badge_template_activities.title: Lean Yellow Belt certification requires: 1. Completion of Yellow Belt training session 2. Passing the Yellow Belt test with score of 85% or above 3. Delivery of a “Just Do It” project with support of a coach.

f4130ad6-8e2b-4d8d-8331-1da3f4b91c87.description: This is to recognize our great people managers who role model Zurich behaviors and are proficient in building trust, managing performance, supporting development and increasing engagement. de751392-73cc-4758-bfad-1cf2e2ef828c.description: By completing the Relationship Mastery Program participants improved their skills in order to build and maintain meaningful customer and partner relationships. de751392-73cc-4758-bfad-1cf2e2ef828c.name: Relationship Mastery Zurich Switzerland

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the 6 month Relationship Mastery Program consisting of the modules Business Acumen, Horizontal Leadership, Negotiation to Success, Establishing Networks and Account Strategy including all mandatory pre-work, in person training, peer group sessions and transfer.

100bc43a-44e8-4a21-9cd7-4d4d0ae0758a.description: The Zurich APAC Managerial Excellence Program is anchored around 3 critical areas where people managers have the biggest impact on their teams: Managing Performance, Supporting Development and Increasing Engagement. This program has been designed as an 8 week experiential journey using highly interactive and practical methodologies for learning such as simulations, skill practice sessions and specific 'go-do' actions to be conducted back at the workplace.
100bc43a-44e8-4a21-9cd7-4d4d0ae0758a.name: APAC Managerial Excellence Program

8a030335-2bb4-4c4b-a346-faf911fd0391.name: Matching Up! Mentee - Mentoring LatAm Program

badge_template_activities.title: *Take the 2 hours' virtual onboarding session *Take the mentee's online mandatory training on My Development (3 hours) *Define 1-3 development goals to address in the 6 months' program *Actively participate in the mentoring sessions arranged with the mentor during the 6 months' program *Complete and send the "Objectives and Results" Format, registering the achievements of the development goals during the program.

8a0d5aa9-0918-409c-9bae-1227a3a4bd3a.description: *Improve listening skills and making powerful questions. *Strengthen inspirational leadership skills. *Strengthen diversity mindset: Learn new ways of doing things and be open to new mentalities. *Support sustainability and future of work skills' development.

48c58489-c69b-45de-a014-20654f2cd7a8.description: By completing the Negotiation training participants now understand the fundamentals of various negotiation techniques. Each module consists of virtual/live visits to leading companies from various industries in the US, Europe and Asia and content from top-tier executive educator IMD focusing on 5 future core capabilities: customer centricity, innovation, navigating ecosystems, leading in a digital age, and sustainability leadership. Catalysts participated in peer coaching to promote an enterprise-wide leadership approach.

The learner will have the foundational ability to apply Agile way of working in their day to day activities and will be equipped with the frameworks & tools to start tomorrow.
e6ecbbc1-9cba-4b31-bb2f-19d6fb9fb99b.name: Zurich Agile Boot Camp

badge_template_activities.title: Participation in an Agile boot camp of about 6 hours duration with 2 hours of hands-on simulation of the Scrum, Kanban frameworks. Play back of the learnings as a group and individual take-aways from the workshop.

128c4edb-3349-4048-8234-37b7a83a846b.description: Earners of this badge have better access to and understanding of the specific life situations of their clients. They have gained first insights into behavioral finance and understand why people sometimes make irrational decisions. They recognise the individual needs of their clients and build a sustainable relationship through target group specific advice. This supports them to know the potential of their existing portfolio and plan concrete activities to expand it.
128c4edb-3349-4048-8234-37b7a83a846b.name: Frauen und Finanzen

badge_template_activities.title: Learners must apply to participate in this program. Upon successful application, learners complete a learning path with various on-site discussion sessions and expert interviews. Certification requires active participation in the Women and Finance program as well as passing the final oral exam: simulation of a client interview.

a075eea9-fa3e-4aac-9b01-8c6447583b0e.description: The Brighter Future Together Program supports Zurich’s leaders to sharpen their skills & gain insights & knowledge to thrive in the new working environment. 53d1594c-ade8-487e-a8a3-6d9cf098145a.description: As an Automation Practitioner, you will be empowered to apply the Automation skills to develop innovative solutions to drive business performance. The participants learned and can now apply new technical expertise; gain recognition by solving real business problems and take the career to the next level. This Program is an enabler for Group Finance to help our employees reach their full potential by growing our talent to take on challenging and rewarding activities.
53d1594c-ade8-487e-a8a3-6d9cf098145a.name: Certified Automation Practitioner Group Finance

92971c10-0cfb-4913-b6b3-3b126038bd46.description: Métodos y herramientas para analizar, resolver problemas y tomar decisiones asertivas; Análisis y resolución de problemas: técnicas como Pareto, gráficas de control, gráficos de dispersión, 5 por qués, análisis de causa básica; Procesos de toma de decisiones:5:5árbol de decisión, análisis de sensibilidad, método de coste-beneficio.
92971c10-0cfb-4913-b6b3-3b126038bd46.name: Super SkillZ: Pensamiento crítico para la toma de decisiones

e29395d8-af5c-4723-9c4e-7c23f6aaf957.description: At the Leadership Day Romandie, participants deepen their competences and take advantage of new opportunities to develop their leadership skills. They deal with topics related to current challenges and opportunities and enrich their perspectives through peer exchange.
e29395d8-af5c-4723-9c4e-7c23f6aaf957.name: Leadership Day Suisse Romande 2022, Zurich Switzerland

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full program of the Leadership Day Romandie in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work and the 6 hours in person training.

da8f6aa4-dacb-410b-8615-8ef9ea8e8615.description: Senior Leaders of the Future is a talent acceleration program created with the purpose to develop the next generation of Zurich leaders. Upon completion of the Learning experience the delegates better understand their resilience, inner energy, purpose and values; understand the link between strategy and customer centricity; had practical opportunities to develop the ability to inspire and empower others; explored the agile approach and learnt to see failure as an opportunity to grow.
da8f6aa4-dacb-410b-8615-8ef9ea8e8615.name: Senior Leaders of the Future - Learning Experience

badge_template_activities.title: Active engagement in a series of modular workshops designed to deepen and hone leadership capability at a senior level. Active participation in a coaching process to realize a personal development plan. Active participation in psychometrics to increase self-awareness and understanding. Personal presentations to senior sponsorship team to evidence traction and learning intent.

3037106e-c8d9-41a1-8a62-03190d8d4df1.description: By completing the Storytelling training participants now understand the fundamentals of good storytelling. The participants learned how to make people care with personal stories, brand stories, or any other kind of story—using the core elements of narrative and established storytelling frameworks. They found out how to maximize connections with their audience and create a culture of storytelling throughout their organization.
3037106e-c8d9-41a1-8a62-03190d8d4df1.name: Storytelling Zurich Switzerland

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Storytelling Training, in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work, the in person training and the transfer work.

5366e6bf-5593-4b26-a3cf-f5bfedc1f5da.description: Responder de la manera más adecuada en caso de un evento catastrófico. Obtener nuevos conocimientos en CAT Plan y acciones. Mejorar la toma de decisiones con respecto a CAT Plan. Obtener nuevos conocimientos en programas IPS.
5366e6bf-5593-4b26-a3cf-f5bfedc1f5da.name: CAT Plan - Eventos Catastróficos

96ffc5ac-4c3e-44d5-bfc1-7a3ee8ec66f7.description: Led NEXT, a global grass-roots movement within Zurich Insurance Company focused on empowering newer generations, promoting intergenerational dialogue and future-proofing the company. Gained experience with localizing a global effort and building an engaged community. Developed intrapreneurial thinking, project management, public speaking, stakeholder influencing and community-building. Grew a point of view on the sustainable development goals and the role Corporations can play in addressing them

66909083-993b-4f56-9ada-9cf01f79ef82.description: This program enables participants to raise their self-awareness, discover their strengths and development areas and accelerate their development for key senior roles through focused development planning.
66909083-993b-4f56-9ada-9cf01f79ef82.name: APAC Senior Leader Assessment & Development Planning Program 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Program participants complete several online diagnostic assessments, along with a 360-degree feedback survey and a career aspirations questionnaire, which will provide a deep insight into individuals’ strengths and development areas.
Program Participants join a 3-hour group feedback workshop to receive their assessments results and understand their strengths and development areas.

Following the assessments and group feedback workshop, program participants receive an individual feedback report and participate in a coaching conversation to support them with targeted career and development planning.

1f6d5b45-d24b-4ccd-8043-2e2602d390d5.description: Individuals who successfully completed their internship, apprenticeship or related experience will have gathered the following skills and expertise: Insurance Industry & financial services knowledge / MS Office Package proficiency / Effective communication proficiency across different level of the organization / Effective presentation & public speaking / Time management / Collaborating effectively across multiple teams / Zurich values & behaviors
1f6d5b45-d24b-4ccd-8043-2e2602d390d5.name: Next Generation Talent - Alumni

169d975e-ff2d-4907-a47f-afa7ea5b9101.description: Certified Lean Green Belts are able to apply advanced Lean tools and techniques to delivery improvements projects in their business area. They also know how to lead change effectively and equip themself with strategies to make a compelling case for change. Through the certification project Lean Green Belts demonstrate their ability to lead improvement projects in their business area with an end-to-end processes focus.
169d975e-ff2d-4907-a47f-afa7ea5b9101.name: Lean Green Belt

badge_template_activities.title: Lean Green Belt certification requirements: 1) Completion of Green Belt training session 2) Passing the Green Belt test with score of 90% or above 3) Delivery of a Green Belt Project with support of a coach 4) Coaching of 2 Lean Yellow Belts through certification

af913fb9-498c-4b50-b573-889327493457.description: As 70% of the learning and development typically comes from on the job experience, My70Percent program allows individuals to take on shorter-term assignments which offer an opportunity to learn and get hands-on development experience on a specific opportunity, develop or deepen certain skills “on the job”, understand how other teams and functions operate and support projects and/or different initiatives.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete one My70Percent assignment.

e65f6730-5250-4eac-b01c-654b0829ea7c.name: Spotlight Employee Recognition Program

badge_template_activities.title: GTO Spotlight Earning Requirements: 1) Being recognized by a co-worker for exemplifying our culture and new ways of working, 2) Being selected amongst all nominees by Zurich senior leaders and winning the public employee vote.

04c2ab80-09d2-41a1-b258-340c43337f86.description: Certified Lean Black Belts are able to apply extensive sets of Lean tools as well as other solutions like Design Thinking or Automation. Through developing effective & relevant Lean change management skills they are capable to lead or provide Lean expertise to transformation projects or continuous improvement programs anywhere in the organization. Through the certification project Lean Black Belts demonstrate their ability lead large, complex Lean initiatives across the organization.
04c2ab80-09d2-41a1-b258-340c43337f86.name: Lean Black Belt

badge_template_activities.title: Lean Black Belt certification requires: 1) Completion of the Black Belt training curriculum 2) Passing the Black Belt test with score of 80% or above 3) Delivery of a Black Belt Project with support of a coach 4) Coaching 2 Lean Green Belts through certification

6df465a4-a93b-40db-b5eb-f87a5cef67f2.description: By completing the Coaching Skills training, participants are aware of their communication style in general and in particular of their coaching style. By discussing specific needs of coachees as well as core competencies of coaches, they gain knowledge on how a coaching process might look like, which results can be achieved and how a specific mindset can either support or hinder the process. To overcome typical boundaries of coaching settings, the participants run role plays based on real cases.
6df465a4-a93b-40db-b5eb-f87a5cef67f2.name: Challenge your Coaching Skills Zurich Switzerland

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full Coaching Skills Training, in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work, the in person training and the transfer tasks.

1006f1b7-0df2-4eb6-b3f1-4715fbee4d00.description: By completing the Leadership Challenge program participants have deep-dived into good people management practices and now are equipped with tools and advice on how to address the key leadership challenges in their current roles. They have been exposed to thought leadership around leading self and others as well as leading into the future. This includes topics such as purpose and values, storytelling, leading blended teams, leading inclusively, leading through relationships.
1006f1b7-0df2-4eb6-b3f1-4715fbee4d00.name: Leadership Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full program of Leadership Challenge, in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work and the 3 virtual webinars.

01fbd6f8-e5b4-4d70-9170-4f095c98458c.description: Learn Engage Apply Perform (LEAP) is a one year soft skill program for people who want to take their career to a next level, by mastering business relevant soft skills. Through a three-pillar structure, participants learn the theory and additionally have the chance to apply the learned in real business cases as well as have an exchange with peers and subject matter experts. The program facilitates access to senior members of the organisation as well as building a strong business network.
01fbd6f8-e5b4-4d70-9170-4f095c98458c.name: LEAP with WIN: Soft Skills development program 2019

badge_template_activities.title: Participants learn the theory and additionally have the chance to apply the learned in real business cases as well as have an exchange with peers and subject matter experts.

4c35cf47-4140-4059-91cf-93828d0bb03d.name: LHH | Elevating Women in Leadership

3b61c494-d338-4ed9-9ced-1e3f2073f663.description: The Great People Manager Recognition Program is designed to recognize people managers who role model the Zurich Values & Behaviours and are proficient at building trust, managing performance, supporting development and increasing engagement. Managers were nominated by their team members and endorsed by their line manager and other stakeholders for this recognition award for demonstrating one or more of the dimensions specified above.
3b61c494-d338-4ed9-9ced-1e3f2073f663.name: Zurich Singapore Great People Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Great People Manager Recognition Program

aab16dd7-24c0-459c-9d18-47fa1a8d03a7.description: Identifica las actividades y tareas más y menos críticas. Utiliza el tiempo de forma eficaz. Identifica los recursos necesarios para completar el trabajo. Determina los requerimientos necesarios para el proyecto o asignación con el fin de distribuir en diferentes tareas. Organiza su tiempo y el de los demás para terminar su trabajo. Desarrolla horarios y determina el progreso.
aab16dd7-24c0-459c-9d18-47fa1a8d03a7.name: Conquering | Planeación y administración de recursos

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Microsoft Teams impartida por un facilitador certificado. Registrar su participación en el curso con la url de microsoft forms enviada durante la sesión. Completar la Ruta de Aprendizaje realizando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Estrategia para tomar decisiones, Getting things done: Organízate con eficacia

b084dbe6-fd6b-4997-ba97-34e2456f743e.description: This program enables participants to raise their self-awareness, discover their strengths, overcome challenges and accelerate their development for key senior roles through focused planning.
b084dbe6-fd6b-4997-ba97-34e2456f743e.name: APAC Senior Leader Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Program participants will complete several online diagnostic assessments, along with a 360-degree feedback survey and a behavior-based interview, which will provide a deep insight into individuals’ strengths and development areas.

Program participants will also be provided with a business challenge to work on (in small teams of 4 participants each) and asked to present their solutions to the challenge sponsor(s) and other senior leaders from the APAC region.

Following the assessments and the business challenge presentations, program participants will receive an individual feedback report and participate in a coaching conversation to support them with targeted career and development planning.

74964e9e-e44d-4b71-9d69-7a4fdc72c5d0.description: Evalua su propio coeficiente de cambio y obtener valiosos fundamentos para mejorar su comportamiento y actitud ante el cambio en el lugar de trabajo. Identifica una mentalidad de adopción al cambio y los beneficios de adoptarla usted, a los demás y en la organización. Reconoce las fases del cambio y cómo moverse a través de ellas de manera efectiva. Mejora las mejores prácticas, herramientas y técnicas para adoptar el cambio en el lugar de trabajo. Crea una nueva mentalidad que influya los demás
74964e9e-e44d-4b71-9d69-7a4fdc72c5d0.name: Conquering | Adoptando el cambio

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Microsoft Teams impartida por un facilitador certificado; Registrar su participación en el curso con la url de microsoft forms enviada durante la sesión; Completar la Ruta de Aprendizaje realizando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Gestión del Cambio, Como aprender del fracaso

6640b469-3b39-468f-afd3-9b4130db6ba4.description: Identifica las habilidades de interacción y los métodos de comunicación adecuados para comunicarse eficazmente con los miembros de un equipo virtual. Demuestra comportamientos que creen relaciones de confianza a través de las diferentes zonas horarias o la distancia, y a través de las diferencias personales y culturales. Crea visibilidad para que los miembros del equipo que deben trabajar por separado puedan centrarse en sus objetivos compartidos, además de los objetivos de la empresa.
6640b469-3b39-468f-afd3-9b4130db6ba4.name: Conquering | Liderando Virtualmente

1bd170f1-124d-4c75-ac2c-574619541a10.description: During the time of COVID-19 employees and managers were invited to a 12-week webinar series to hear from world experts and Zurich leaders on the things which matter most during extraordinary times. Leaders shared personal experiences, insights and best practises to help Zurich employees stay connected, stay healthy and stay empowered.

13522fab-9a99-4a2b-bd5a-34c23d999615.description: Conceptos básicos en la resolución de problemas y el pensamiento críticoConocer el vínculo existente entre pensamiento crítico y resolución de problemas.Identificar tipos de problemas y alternativas para la solución. Conocer el proceso que hay que desarrollar para resolver problemas y cómo hacerlo con pensamiento crítico. Herramientas a desarrollar para mejorar nuestra capacidad de pensamiento crítico.
13522fab-9a99-4a2b-bd5a-34c23d999615.name: Super SkillZ: Resolucion de Problemas

badge_template_activities.title: Participación en la sesión virtual (2 horas) Participación en el curso online (LIL): Pensamiento estratégico (1 hora) Participación en el curso online (LIL): ¿Cómo mejorar tu capacidad para tomar decisiones? (1 hora)

skills.name: Modelo de resolución de problemas y herramientas para resolver utilizando pensamiento crítico
Pensar para resolver y no para detener

a730ffcf-de73-4b74-a63d-9b1e85a77667.description: Identifica las tareas y responsabilidades que puede delegar para conseguir resultados clave para el negocio y desarrollar las capacidades de su equipo. Aplica un proceso para seleccionar a las personas adecuadas según las tareas y responsabilidades que se desea delegar. Planifica una estrategia de delegación eficaz identificando las expectativas y los límites claros para preparar a las personas para el éxito. Identifica los riesgos comunes de la delegación, así como las técnicas para superarlos.
a730ffcf-de73-4b74-a63d-9b1e85a77667.name: Conquering | Delegando con enfoque

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Microsoft Teams impartida por un facilitador certificado. Registrar su participación en el curso con la url de microsoft forms enviada durante la sesión. Completar la Ruta de Aprendizaje realizando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Como gestionar empleados de alto rendimiento; Como crear una cultura de alto rendimiento.

222b7364-8afe-4bd2-92ab-2885aece383b.description: Certified ITIL®4 Digital and IT Strategy specialists demonstrate the use of the ITIL guiding principles in digital and IT strategy decisions and activities. The learner understands how to leverage digital strategy to react to digital disruption, how an organization uses the strategy to remain viable, the steps and techniques involved in defining and advocating for a Digital and IT Strategy as well as how this strategy can be implemented.
222b7364-8afe-4bd2-92ab-2885aece383b.name: ITIL® 4 Digital and IT Strategy (DITS)

badge_template_activities.title: ITIL® 4 Digital and IT Strategy certification requirements: 1) Completion of the ITIL® 4 Digital and IT Strategy training session 2) Take the ITIL® 4 Digital and IT Strategy Certification exam 3) Pass the exam with the 70% or higher

a73e0d48-4e3d-4d88-b8df-e6cbeb819cd6.description: Preparado para comunicar eficazmente las estrategias empresariales y las motivaciones que impulsan la necesidad del cambio. Utiliza tres acciones para acelerar la implantación del cambio en el equipo de trabajo. Reconoce la naturaleza de la resistencia y utilizar un conjunto de habilidades para descubrirla y responder a ella. Determina los aspectos del cambio que pueden ser controlados o influenciados. Utiliza el proceso de interacción para llevar a cabo discusiones eficaces.
a73e0d48-4e3d-4d88-b8df-e6cbeb819cd6.name: Conquering | Dirigir el cambio

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Microsoft Teams impartida por un facilitador certificado. Registrar su participación en el curso con la url de microsoft forms enviada durante la sesión. Completar la Ruta de Aprendizaje realizando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Como liderarel cambio en tu empresa, Liderazgo transformador.

681a4048-6e15-4ba6-9e33-ec325d5b198d.description: Certified ITIL®4 Managing Professional Transition specialists demonstrate sufficient understanding of the new ITIL 4 Foundation concepts and definitions how they can be practically applied. The learner understands the key elements from each one of the four ITIL Managing Professional (MP) modules: Create, Deliver and Support, Drive Stakeholder Value, High Velocity IT and Direct, Plan and Improve, as well as ITIL 4 Foundation.
681a4048-6e15-4ba6-9e33-ec325d5b198d.name: ITIL® 4 Managing Professional Transition

badge_template_activities.title: ITIL® 4 Managing Professional Transition certification requirements: 1) Completion of the ITIL® 4 Managing Professional Transition training session 2) Take the ITIL® 4 Managing Professional Transition Certification exam 3) Pass the exam with the 70% or higher

6a937bab-466f-4a19-90c1-78f7f316c029.description: By completing the Leadership Breakthrough program participants now understand the fundamentals of good management. They will have been exposed to core management skills and attributes, including coaching, giving and receiving feedback, leadership styles, leading through change, leading inclusively, performance management, talent management, and leading with a growth mindset.
6a937bab-466f-4a19-90c1-78f7f316c029.name: Leadership Challenge Zurich Switzerland

badge_template_activities.title: Attend the full program of Leadership Breakthrough, in particular completion of all the mandatory pre-work and the four in person trainings.

584740ad-4768-4dfb-b46b-db6b2b7ebcf1.description: The Manager Recognition Program is designed to recognize people managers who role model the Zurich Values & Behaviors and are proficient at building trust, managing performance, supporting development and increasing engagement. Managers were nominated by their team members and endorsed by their line manager and other stakeholders for this recognition award for demonstrating one or more of the dimensions specified above.
584740ad-4768-4dfb-b46b-db6b2b7ebcf1.name: Manager Recognition Program

badge_template_activities.title: Manager Recognition Program for Singapore

1da2e97f-2d90-4499-8aa6-99c508ad51c5.description: Diferencia claramente y busca oportunidades de alto nivel que brinden un beneficio significativo para el individuo, el equipo y la organización. Aplica habilidades avanzadas para conducir sesiones convincentes, colaborativas y gratificantes de coaching. Busca y ofrece feedback donde las personas puedan aceptar y actuar para asegurar el logro de las metas de negocio. Monitorea y mide la mejora continua en sus propias habilidades de coaching y de aquellos a quienes les brinda coaching.
1da2e97f-2d90-4499-8aa6-99c508ad51c5.name: Conquering | Coaching para un alto desempeño

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Cómo hacer coaching a tus empleados para obtener resultados; Empodera a tus empleados.

4a946c69-8520-475a-bbda-50122df8fa39.description: Tiene la habilidad para impulsar el cambio, entendiendo la importancia de involucrar a todos los interesados e involucrado; enfrentando la resistencia, comunicándose y construyendo el compromiso. Mejoró el entendimiento y habilidad para apalancar las aportaciones del Indicador de Estilo de Cambio - Change Style Indicator® (CSI). Mejoró las habilidades en liderar y motivar a otros a través de iniciativas de cambio organizacionales.
4a946c69-8520-475a-bbda-50122df8fa39.name: Conquering | Hacer que el cambio suceda

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Diseño de estrategias de crecimiento; Navegar el cambio en tiempos difíciles.

2fac811e-8cd8-4cd1-929c-1dbbb37ebe09.description: Identifica y evalúa oportunidades de influencia y escoge estrategias para alcanzar los resultados de negocio. Evalúa la red de negocio y construye apoyo recíproco en relaciones de trabajo de largo plazo en todos los niveles de la organización. Apalanca su poder personal para mover a las personas a tomar acción en esas ideas, oportunidades y recomendaciones que tendrán el mayor impacto en las prioridades de la organización. Captura la atención de las personas y hace que las cosas sucedan.
2fac811e-8cd8-4cd1-929c-1dbbb37ebe09.name: Conquering | Influencia para el impacto organizacional

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2.5 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Cómo conseguir que aprueben tus ideas; Cómo ejercer tu influencia.

831f7a24-c0de-46a3-9862-0d54ac36a22f.description: Conoce cómo la inteligencia emocional (IE) afecta los resultados del negocio. Entiende cómo el secuestro emocional interfiere con los valores y resultados. Reconoce los cinco elementos de IE y aprender habilidades para fortalecer cada una. Sabe analizar su IE y el impacto de su propio nivel de dominio en las personas que los rodean. Sabe identificar sus disparadores emocionales y aplica técnicas para que pueda responder efectivamente en lugar de reaccionar de manera inapropiada.
831f7a24-c0de-46a3-9862-0d54ac36a22f.name: Conquering | Liderando con Inteligencia Emocional

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Inteligencia emocional en la gestión empresarial; Liderazgo inclusivo.

bf4c7cc2-63ec-45a3-aa49-243d6d416078.description: Reconoce los cinco factores de éxito fundamentales para maximizar el rendimiento del equipo. Comprende la importancia del papel que cada uno desempeña como líder en la creación y mantenimiento del entorno de un equipo de alto rendimiento. Evalua el rendimiento de su equipo para identificar las condiciones que les impiden alcanzar los máximos resultados. Aplica los factores de éxito para fortalecer el rendimiento de su equipo. Crea un plan de acción para que él y su equipo lo pongan en práctica
bf4c7cc2-63ec-45a3-aa49-243d6d416078.name: Conquering | Maximizando el desempeño del equipo

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 2 horas en Microsoft Teams impartida por un facilitador certificado. Completar la Ruta de Aprendizaje realizando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Liderazgo y trabajo en equipo; El futuro de la gestión del rendimiento.

5b4ca176-562f-4e55-9948-b5c839ca56df.description: Puede implementar acciones de liderazgo que disminuyan los desafíos ante la creación de un ambiente innovador. Reconoce su rol como líder para construir y mantener las condiciones para la innovación. Establece compromisos periódicos y los mide para conservar la responsabilidad de inculcar una cultura de innovación en su equipo.
5b4ca176-562f-4e55-9948-b5c839ca56df.name: Conquering | Promover una cultura de innovación

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 3 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Jeff Weiner y cómo establecer una cultura y un plan de crecimiento; Liderazgo con innovación.

e572d5fd-d0e7-417a-a3ad-af6456201b7b.description: Entiende los elementos esenciales requeridos para implementar exitosamente la estrategia. Supera los retos que interfieren con la implementación de la estrategia. Alto nivel de compromiso con sus equipos en la ejecución de la estrategia. Sabe cómo sostener la ejecución a largo plazo.
e572d5fd-d0e7-417a-a3ad-af6456201b7b.name: Conquering | Traduciendo la estrategia en resultados

badge_template_activities.title: Realizar la formación online de 3 horas en Zoom impartida por un facilitador especializado y certificado. Realizar la Ruta de Aprendizaje completando los dos cursos definidos de Linkeding Learning: Gestión de Proyectos: Resolución de problemas; Agilidad Estratégica.

skills.name: Impulsar El Logro De Los Resultados

a52a4236-c43d-4ca9-a60d-08a85a6e1a47.description: Certified ITIL®4 Drive Stakeholder Value specialists can efficiently onboard costumers and guide them through the ways in which services can co-create value by applying ITIL® 4 into IT Service Management. The learner understands how to co-create value with stakeholders by fostering a service mindset and nurturing user communities and how to build trusted relationships to target stakeholders with the right services and value propositions.
a52a4236-c43d-4ca9-a60d-08a85a6e1a47.name: ITIL® 4 Drive Stakeholder Value (DSV)

badge_template_activities.title: ITIL® 4 Drive Stakeholder Value certification requirements: 1) Completion of the ITIL® 4 Drive Stakeholder Value training session 2) Take the ITIL® 4 Drive Stakeholder Value Certification exam 3) Pass the exam with the 70% or higher

To professionally assess and provide relevant coaching and guidance for employees who are assessed, this individual participated in a full day training in psychometrics and how to provide feedback via an interactive training program and simulation delivered by organizational psychologists.
